description: React component 'AuthGate' that wraps children components, enforcing authentication. It manages user sign-in via email magic link or OAuth providers, rendering a sign-in UI when unauthenticated.

methods.name: AuthGate({ children, optional = false })
methods.description: React functional component that provides authentication gating for its children, allowing optional unauthenticated access.

methods.name: handleEmail
methods.description: Handles email-based sign-in by sending a sign-in link to the user's email.

methods.name: handleOAuth
methods.description: Handles OAuth sign-in with specified provider ('github' or 'google').

ctags.name: AuthGate
ctags.pattern: /^export default function AuthGate({ children, optional = false }) {$/
